Package utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    The Color class is used to give the SceneObjects a color.
    Image
    The Image class is used to represent an Image (or frame if you will) that gets projected on the screen by the renderer and is seen by the Camera.
    Light
    The light class inherits from abstract class SceneObject to give the light a color and a position.
    Options
    The Options class is used to store all the options relating to the raytracer (can contain more options at a later stage).
    Ray
    The Ray class is used to represent a ray that gets shot from the Camera object and into the scene to look for intersections with Shape objects or Light objects.
    RayHit
    The RayHit class is used to contain information about an intersection between a Ray object and a Shape object.
    Vector3D
    The Vector3D class is used to represent a three dimensional vector that can be used for calculations in the three dimensional space.
